name: Revelations from the Past
desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: Rite of the Bold
customize.desc: Go to the Children of Echoes and search for clues concerning the Volcanic Token.

customize.name: Between Pledge and Forgettance
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Little One, a little Tepetlisaurus that received "Blessing," to cure it.

customize.name: Lost in the Woods
customize.desc: After having just arrived in Natlan, you are teleported to a strange space...

customize.name: Rite of the Bold
customize.desc: Go to the Children of Echoes and search for clues concerning the Volcanic Token.

customize.name: Revelations from the Past
customize.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: The Cornerstone of Stars and Flames
customize.desc:
"Heroes ignite the sacred flame, illuminating the world, yet eventually they shall rest, nestled among the stars."

"They left behind a stone, a weaving. With these as our foundation, we have erected an everlasting civilization."

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
O Red Sea, Part, and Clear a Path!
Gold of the Sun, Together with his Blood

Go to the entrance of the ruins
Place the talisman
Talk to

customize.name: Manqu
customize.desc: A researcher for the Saurian Relics Association, who is responsible for scholarly inquiries into certain tribal customs. The real Manqu was a craftsman who lived a thousand years ago and died during the overthrow of the tyrant Och-Kan. Now, Manqu is a phlogiston projection of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan.

customize.text:

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Manqu
customize.desc: A researcher for the Saurian Relics Association, who is responsible for scholarly inquiries into certain tribal customs. The real Manqu was a craftsman who lived a thousand years ago and died during the overthrow of the tyrant Och-Kan. Now, Manqu is a phlogiston projection of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan.

customize.name: Golden Entreaty
customize.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruins of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's back. Golden inscriptions are etched into the surface of the white disc, and when touched, one can sense the intricate patterns pulsating as if imbued with life.

customize.text:
After completing the Quest, the following Quest Items can be obtained from the chests.
<color=#ffffff>Luxurious Chest</color>

customize.name: Iridescent Inscription Fragment
customize.desc: A fragment of a shattered Iridescent Inscription. It is broken beyond repair and can no longer serve its purpose. Though dismissed by many as delusional obsession, some still believe they hold the key to unraveling messages from ancient civilizations.

customize.name: Shattered Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...
